basic.description:
This course examines disability and physical activity across a range of settings from recreation to competitive sport. Topics to be covered will include: accessibility; disability sport; inclusive physical activity opportunities; and fitness and training for persons with disabilities.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (30L;6G;12O;60P)
basic.subject: KNPE
basic.title: Physical Activity for Persons with Disabilities

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 3 or above in a PHED, KINE or HLTH Major or Medial Plan and (KNPE237 or KNPE336 or KNPE436).
